message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a discounted price! I'm willing to let it go for $10000, a 100% discount from its original price. It's a one-time offer, so you shouldn't miss it!
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'd like to wait for more information about the product's quality before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me give you some more context. This product has been used by a small number of people, and they've reported mixed results. Some have seen minimal benefits, while others have experienced no benefits at all. Given the uncertainty, I'm willing to lower the price to $9500. It's still a great deal, considering the potential upside.

I'm still not convinced. The uncertainty and mixed results make me hesitant to spend $9500 on a product with a 66.67% chance of being low-quality. I'd like to wait for more information or a better offer.

This is a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. Don't miss it!
